string-array.name: simple_word
string-array.item: Order the balls, by color, match to semaphore on right of the display
Just should touch the ball that you want does move to empty plate.
Just can move the balls together to the empty plate, as that just can move one ball by touch.

string-array.name: hot_word
string-array.item: The temperature has increase too much, the red balls, has been come hot balls.
They try finish quick the game, rise automatilly to position assigned

string-array.name: green_word
string-array.item: We should be orderly to forewarn that the temperature increase other time
Order the balls, since minor until major, depending number\'s itself ball, staring whit 1 on left to the display
Order its by color, match to semaphore on right of the display

string-array.name: frozen_word
string-array.item: The temperature has decrease too much, some balls green and yellow on its rows assigned has been frost. Its can\'t move
The red balls is early of have the some fate, but if there are more one red ball on row assigned, can defrost and move with 2 touchs
For defrost the balls should order its assigned row, or the row more early.
